chat.title: Chat
chat.placeholder: Chat will be available after configuration
chat.description: Configure your knowledge base to start asking questions.
chat.semanticDescription: Ask a question to run semantic retrieval and display the most relevant chunks.
chat.lexicalDescription: Ask a question to run lexical BM25 retrieval on exact terms.
chat.searchPlaceholder: Example: What is the backup policy?
chat.emptyResults: Type a query to display results.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configuration settings will appear here after setting up your knowledge base.
settings.chunkingDescription: Tune splitting strategy and preview results.
settings.embeddingDescription: Configure embedding provider, API keys, and cache.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Monitoring and statistics will appear here once ingestion is launched.
